item.title: Street Light 12, 20th December
item.description:
Street light number 12 on Lancaster Grove, NW3 has a sharp piece of metal protruding from a metal band around the lamp post at approximately body height. The exposed metal is sticking outwards and presents a hazard to pedestrians and could cause injury or damage to clothing. The lamp post requires inspection and repair to remove or secure the protruding metal.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37, Lancaster Grove, Belsize Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
